snippet: Louis Freeh, who is charged with the job of returning assets to MF Global's creditors, is expected to testify alongside regulators, as well as another trustee tasked with returning money to customers.
abstract: Louis Freeh, who is charged with the job of returning assets to MF Global's creditors, is expected to testify alongside regulators, as well as another trustee tasked with returning money to customers.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and BEN PROTESS

headline.main: Senate Banking Committee to Hold MF Global Hearing
headline.print_headline: Senate Panel In Fresh Look At Missteps At MF Global
